name: xMoney
public_notice: Utrust has been acquired by Elrond Foundation and rebranded to xMoney. For more information, refer to their Tweet.

description.ko:
블록체인기반 온라인 거래 플랫폼

기존의 페이팔, 신용카드를 대체할 수 있는 서비스를 지향

구매자, 판매자를 동시에 만족시킬 수 있는 저비용 고효율 서비스를 목표로 함

총 16명의 프로젝트 팀으로 구성되어 있으며 프로그래머가 10명 이상으로 이중 MIT출신도 포함되어 있는 훌륭한 팀을 꾸리고 있다는 평가를 받고 있습니다.

거의 동일한 플랫폼을 개발 중인 경쟁업체 Verify가 있습니다. 하지만 대체적으로 UTRUST가 더 나은 프로젝트 팀원을 보유하고 있는 것으로 평가되고 있습니다.

ico_data.description: Revolutionary payment platform that empowers buyers providing a groundbreaking purchase protection mechanism

status_updates.description:
Hey everyone! Crypto IS the Money of Tomorrow. Thanks to our partnership with Transak you can now buy $UTK with fiat currencies!

Experience it now - https://bit.ly/3iSthJZ

Hey everyone! 🎉 Ready for crypto-friendly holidays? Now you can book rooms from Expedia, Priceline, or Booking.com with digital currencies! We’re joining forces with Travala to make the whole world embrace crypto 🌍🛩

Read it here: https://bit.ly/2DkHkIC

NEWS 🎉  Utrust and Elrond Network are working together to bring $ERD and $UTK to millions of customers worldwide! 🌍

Read all about it here -> https://bit.ly/30BeFa7

Hey everyone! We told you we were just getting started! 🎉 

We're now adding support for Latin American currencies such as $BRL, $MXN, $ARS, $DOP, and $CLP so that even more businesses can get access to the power of crypto. 

Follow it up here - https://bit.ly/3fr4JGJ

Hey everyone! More and more merchants are now onboarding and accepting digital currencies! Utrust is bringing the power of crypto to online businesses around the world - and we're just getting started. 

Shop now from some of our new merchants:
 
👉  https://linktr.ee/utrust

Hey everyone! We believe in a truly borderless and global eCommerce world. That's why today we are expanding our international footprint with support for +10 local fiat currencies in Asia, including $CNY $JPY $INR and many others! 

👉  https://bit.ly/2NRfQMW

Hey everyone! We keep shaping the future of payments and we know how painful it is to request international payments. So we are fixing it with a NEW invoicing feature. 🎉 

Help us build our new features by joining our limited beta before public release 👉  https://bit.ly/3fUfSzw
